name: test_e2e_with_logs[028_SQLI_BLIND_009]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_009` |
| **Name** | Column count discovery |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name='users')>3 --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20AND%20(SELECT%20COUNT(*)%20FROM%20information_schema.columns%20WHERE%20table_name%3D'users')%3E3%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~25000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:26:27.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_009-1769351187750-j2seco pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_009 uri=/?q='%20AND%20(SELECT%20COUNT(*)%20FROM%20information_schema.columns%20WHERE%20table_name%3D'users')%3E3%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
